text: Jerry Adriani (Jair Alves de Sousa; 29 January 1947 - 23 April 2017) was a Brazilian singer, musician and actor. He began his career in television while working with Rede Tupi in S達o Paulo. His early works were as a vocalist for the group Os Rebeldes. Adriani died at a hospital in Rio de Janeiro from cancer on 23 April 2017, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Brazil Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian guitarists Category:Actors from S達o Paulo Category:Musicians from S達o Paulo Category:Singers from S達o Paulo
title: Jerry Adriani
